summary: THE VEHICLE STALLED WHILE DRIVING AND WOULD NOT RESTART.   THE VEHICLE HAD TO BE TOWED TO THE DEALER.   A RECALL WAS ISSUED FOR THE TIMING BELT AND THE SYMPTOMS OF THAT FAILURE WERE SIMILAR TO THE PROBLEM THE CONSUMERS VEHICLE EXPERIENCED.  THE CONSUMER HAD TO PAY FOR REPAIRS.  . *AK  *CB   *NLM
